It is just a dream. I am Death, destroyer of the worlds. Revenge is mine. I hear your voice Humanity, I hear your voice and I am here on Earth now. You call me. God fury shall be upon your heads! I will take your souls and I will fest with them, Christian souls, Muslims souls, Hindu souls etc. every single soul! GOD WILL BE RESTORED!
